refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: General constructor for mesh_fem objects (Finite Element basis
Return a getfem handle to the newly created mesh_fem object.

* gf_mesh_fem('load', string fname[, Mesh m]) Load a MeshFem from a file. If the mesh `m` is not supplied (this kind of file does not store the mesh), then it is read from the file `fname` and its descriptor is returned as the second output argument.
* gf_mesh_fem('from_string', string [, mesh M]) Create a MeshFem object from its string description. See also gf_mesh_fem_get(MF,'('char')
